TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示模糊化工具針對適當的組件 (Assembly) 型別，使用它們的標準模糊化規則。

span.span: Instructs obfuscation tools to use their standard obfuscation rules for the appropriate assembly type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會提供方法讓組件作者，加上註解其二進位檔，以便模糊化工具可以正確進行處理以最低的外部組態。The and attributes provide a way for assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration. 將這個屬性套用至組件會告訴模糊化工具使用其預設規則組件類型。Applying this attribute to an assembly tells the obfuscation tool to use its default rules for the assembly type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化的組件。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只會提供指示模糊化工具。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商遵循此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具，會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. 您可以套用組件中的類型和這些類型的成員。You can apply to types within an assembly, and to members on those types. 最內層的屬性會控制的方式模糊化工具會將任何特定的程式碼實體。The innermost attribute controls the way an obfuscation tool treats any particular code entity. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示已對其已標示為私用組件。The following code example shows a private assembly that has been marked with the . 屬性是`false`，以防止模糊化工具處理後移除屬性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. 如需示範如何使用的程式碼範例具有，請參閱類別。For a code example that shows the use of with , see the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool assemblyIsPrivate) cil managed

param.name: assemblyIsPrivate
param.span: 如果組件是用於某個應用程式的範圍中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the assembly is used within the scope of one application; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定要模糊化的組件是公用或私用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the assembly to be obfuscated is public or private.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它們僅供您的應用程式，而不供其他軟體程式庫，請將標示為私用組件。Mark assemblies as private if they are used only by your application, and are not libraries to be used by other software. 一般而言，標示為私用組件會告訴模糊化工具，它可能會混淆之所有方法，包括公用方法，做為一部分模糊化應用程式的名稱。Generally, marking an assembly as private tells an obfuscator that it can obfuscate the names of all methods, including public methods, as part of obfuscating an application. 組件是公用的如果模糊化工具應該不會混淆公用成員的名稱。If an assembly is public, an obfuscator should not obfuscate the names of public members. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化的組件。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只會提供指示模糊化工具。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商遵循此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具，會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示如何屬性建構函式指定組件是私用。The following code example shows how the attribute constructor specifies that an assembly is private. 屬性是`false`，以防止模糊化工具處理後移除屬性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 值，指出組件是否標記為私用。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the assembly was marked private.

value.span: 如果組件已標記為私用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the assembly was marked private; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要它是在進行時，應用程式，而不是由其他軟體，則會使用私用組件。A private assembly is used only by the application of which it is a part, and not by other software. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化的組件。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只會提供指示模糊化工具。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商遵循此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具，會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性的建構函式屬性設`true`，以指定組件是私用。The following code example shows how the attribute constructor sets the property to `true`, to specify that an assembly is private. 屬性是`false`，以防止模糊化工具處理後移除屬性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出模糊化工具是否應該在進行處理後移除屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing.

value.span: 如果模糊化工具應該在進行處理後移除屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, .
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的程式庫會納入其他應用程式的一部分，並模糊處理，該應用程式的一部分，不應該加以移除屬性。Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application. 指定模糊化工具應該去除不會影響的執行個體，已套用至型別和組件中的成員。Specifying that obfuscation tools should strip the does not affect instances of that have been applied to types and members within the assembly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化的組件。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只會提供指示模糊化工具。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商遵循此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具，會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示屬性搭配屬性設定為`false`，以防止模糊化工具處理後移除屬性。The following code example shows the attribute with the property set to `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing.
